## xde 

**`ramp.xds`** includes the standard SEIS model and the delay SEIS model. The standard model, without demography, is:

$$
\frac{dS}{dt} = - h S + r I \\
\frac{dE}{dt} = h S - \nu E \\
\frac{dI}{dt} = \nu E - r I\\
$$

$$
\bar E = h S/ \nu \\ 
\bar I = \nu E / r \\

$$
